original_text: During this time now, we have troubles and pain. But I am sure that these troubles are not really very great. One day God will show us all the great things he has prepared for us. That will make the troubles that we have now seem very small.
korean_text: 생각하건대 현재의 고난은 장차 우리에게 나타날 영광과 비교할 수 없도다

sentences.original_text: During this time now, we have troubles and pain.
sentences.korean_translation: 지금 이 시간 동안, 우리는 고통과 아픔이 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: that these troubles are not really very great.
sentences.korean_translation: 이러한 고통들이 정말로 크지 않다는 것을.

sentences.original_text: One day God will show us
all the great things he has prepared for us.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 우리를 위해 준비하신 모든 위대한 것들을.

sentences.original_text: that we have now seem very small.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 지금 가지고 있는 고통들이 아주 작아 보이도록.
